title: Can Language Models Perform Robust Reasoning in Chain-of-thought Prompting with Noisy Rationales?
details: Z Zhou, R Tao, J Zhu, Y Luo, Z Wang, B Han - arXiv preprint arXiv:2410.23856, 2024
abstract: This paper investigates an under-explored challenge in large language models (LLMs): chain-of-thought prompting with noisy rationales, which include irrelevant or inaccurate reasoning thoughts within examples used for in-context learning. We …
